title: Affordable, Responsive, Scalable
text: At First Start, we create affordable and responsive websites for new startups, college projects, and any business that needs a website.

section.title: Why FirstStart?
section.content: First Start offers affordable, responsive, and scalable websites for startups, students, and businesses needing a professional online presence.

section.title: What do we offer to you?
section.content: We offer affordable, responsive, and scalable websites for startups and businesses.
